text: Akshat훮 N훮r훮yan M큰rty (born 25 April 1980) is a Indian heiress, businesswoman, fashion designer and venture capitalist who was the Spouse of the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2022 to 2024, as the wife of Prime Minister Rishi Sunak. Murty is also the daughter of N. R. Narayana Murthy, a founder of the Indian multi-national IT company Infosys, and Sudha Murty. title: Akshata Murty
